data.other: Major traffic congestion in Towcester Town due to building works opposite Racecourse. data.other: Major traffic congestion in Towcester Town due to building works opposite Racecourse. Suggest you leave A43 at Silverstone, head for Whittlebury, then once in Village, turn left then first right towards Paulersbury, then when you get to A5, turn left.
